about.description:
The API based on Pablo Bleyer Kocik’s d2xx extension.

Version 1.1.0 is compatible with Python 3. Please ensure you have FTDI
drivers installed or available where the linker looks for shared libraries
(e.g., PATH on windows, LD_LIBRARY_PATH or standard library directories
on Linux)
about.summary: ftd2xx is a simple python wrapper around the D2XX DLL from FTDI using ctypes.

name: ftd2xx
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ftd2xx" %}
{% set version = "1.3.6" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e5af93ddeb672e7b653c480ac30d9d4a3c769dc088778d97bcbab59441ae808d

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.8
    - pip
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
  run:
    - python >=3.8
    - future
    - pywin32  # [win]
    - __win    # [win]
    - __unix   # [not win]

# Tests done in run_test.py

about:
  home: https://github.com/snmishra/ftd2xx/blob/master/LICENSE
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: ftd2xx is a simple python wrapper around the D2XX DLL from FTDI using ctypes.

  description: |
    The API based on Pablo Bleyer Kocik’s d2xx extension.

    Version 1.1.0 is compatible with Python 3. Please ensure you have FTDI
    drivers installed or available where the linker looks for shared libraries
    (e.g., PATH on windows, LD_LIBRARY_PATH or standard library directories
    on Linux)

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hmaarrfk
